content: originally designed for malabrigo march 2018 using rasta but you can use any yarn --------------------------- **1 skein of rasta + 2 hours = 1 cowl** no need to wait long to wear those gorgeous colours ♥ designed for almost instant gratification - no need to swatch and the instructions are written so that you ll use all the yarn but won t have to worry about running out it s also designed to be reversible - i really like the woven look you get with the ws gauge isn t critical because you adjust the size as you knit **note about how to position for wear - it s designed to be worn with the top bit folded under see photo #1 ** many thanks to the testers lauragb /people/lauragb kimberlyht /people/kimberlyht ktell /people/ktell pamelaric /people/pamelaric 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/stitchnerds/3752587/1-25#1
